tool_description: Jumia Api allows you to select the specific data you want from the [https://www.jumia.ma/] Jumia website in a JSON format. This gives you easy access to search, products, prices, categories, sales, rankings, reviews and more.
title: Jumia Service

api_list.name: Get Product Feedbacks
api_list.description: This endpoints displays the feedbacks for one product
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://jumia-service.p.rapidapi.com/api/products/{product}/feedBacks"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jumia-service.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Products by name
api_list.description: This endpoints returns all products searched by name
